title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Lunchbox: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Lunchbox: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Lunchbox answering some random questions. Plus, Lunchbox has a lot to say about why he still carries around cash and his fear of the ocean. And Morgan shares why grocery stores are frustrating her lately and the big life change she’s had to make.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
